channel.title: Smelting Bars Problem

item.title: Smelting Bars Problem
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

You are using " < " (stands for Less Than) where you should be using " >= " (stands forr Greater Than or Equal To).
Example: The code to smelt mithril should look like this:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 447 && playerLevel [13] >= 50){ deleteItem(447, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smelt the mithril ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); }

To make it clear:
You need to change the “&& playerLevel [13] <” so they are “&& playerLevel [13] >=”
I hope you understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Smelting Bars Problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

I made it so you can smelt mith, adamant, and runeite ores. But this does not seem to work. It only works if it have 99 smithing or something. Here are my codes:

} if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 447 && playerLevel [13] < 50){ deleteItem(447, 1); addItem(2349, 1); sM("You smelt the mithril ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 449 && playerLevel [13] < 70){ deleteItem(449, 1); addItem(2361, 1); sM("You smelt the adamant ore."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(7502, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 451 && playerLevel [13] < 85){ deleteItem(451, 1); addItem(2363, 1); sM("You smelt the runeite ore"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(15001, 13); }

Read full topic
